extension.name: Button - Versioning
extension.author: Michael Fatica
extension.description: Fatica Consulting L.L.C. - Simple Content Versioning Editor Plugin

field.name: front_end
field.label: Display on Front End?
field.description: This parameter allows you to hide the versioning button on the front-end.

field.name: allow_delete
field.label: Allow Version Deletion?
field.description: This parameter allows you to enable/disable the ability to delete versions.

field.name: popup_width
field.label: Popup Window Width
field.description: This parameter allows you to set the width of the popup window.

field.name: popup_height
field.label: Popup Window Height
field.description: This parameter allows you to set the height of the popup window.
